document.docAuthor: Zhou, Juan, Zhang, Yalin & Huang, Min
document.masterDocTitle: First records of the Oriental Eurhadina (Singhardina) robusta species group from China with descriptions of five new species (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: First records of the Oriental Eurhadina (Singhardina) robusta species group from China with descriptions of five new species (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae)

heading.emphasis:
Key to species of
E. ( S. ) robusta
group (males)

paragraph.keyLead:
1. Aedeagal shaft with one pair of dorsal appendages ( Figs 88–90 ).............................
E. ( S. ) immatura
sp. nov.
- Aedeagal shaft with both ventral and dorsal appendages ( Figs 11 , 23 , 36 , 49 , 62 , 75 )................................ 2
2. Dorsal appendages of aedeagal shaft not bifurcate ( Figs 11 , 23 , 36 , 49 , 62 )........................................ 3

3. Ventral appendages of aedeagal shaft bifurcate ( Fig. 36 )....................................
E. ( S. ) dissimilis
sp. nov.
- Ventral appendages of aedeagal shaft not bifurcate ( Figs 11 , 23 , 49 , 62 ).......................................... 4
- Dorsal appendages of aedeagal shaft without protrusion ( Figs 11 , 23 , 62 )......................................... 6

5. Dorsal appendages of aedeagal shaft with a short protrusion basally.........................
E. ( S. ) rika Dworakowska

- Dorsal appendages of aedeagal shaft with a short protrusion near apical 1/3 ( Fig. 50 )................
E. ( S. ) flatilis
sp. nov.

6. Aedeagal shaft with ventral appendages circularly bent in lateral view ( Fig. 25 ).......................................................................................................
E. ( S. ) pookiewica Dworakowska
rec. nov.
- Aedeagal shaft with ventral appendages slightly curved in lateral view ( Figs 11 , 62 )................................ 7

8. Dorsal appendages of aedeagal shaft shorter than ventral ones.............................
E. ( S. ) hema Dworakowska

- Dorsal appendages of aedeagal shaft longer than ventral ones ( Fig. 62 )..........................
E. ( S. ) fumosa
sp. nov.

9. Ventral appendages of aedeagal shaft sinuate.....................................
E. ( S. ) sikkimensis Dworakowska

- Ventral appendages of aedeagal shaft straight ( Fig. 11 )........................
E. ( S. ) krispinilla Dworakowska
rec. nov.
- Ventral appendages of aedeagal shaft not bifurcate.......................................................... 12

11. Ventral appendages of aedeagal shaft shorter than dorsal ones and with short protrusion at basal 1/3 ( Fig. 77 ).................................................................................................
E. ( S. ) furca
sp. nov.

- Ventral appendages of aedeagal shaft longer than dorsal ones and without short protrusion at basal 1/3...................................................................................................
E. ( S. ) robusta Mahmood

12. Aedeagal shaft with dorsal appendages longer than inner branch of ventral appendages..........
E. ( S. ) mala Dworakowska
- Aedeagal shaft with dorsal appendages and inner branch of ventral appendages nearly equal long..................... 11

13. Ventral appendages of aedeagal shaft with two branches nearly equal wide....................
E. ( S. ) rona Dworakowska

- Ventral appendages of aedeagal shaft with inner branch thinner than outer ones................
E. ( S. ) dina Dworakowska
